name: Soul Hollows
description:
Soul Hollows is a free game circulating around others that you do not truly know. 

Whilst lost in a seemingly long abandoned set of tunnels you are required to press forward through the unfamiliar environment.

The only thing left for the player to guide their way is a set of notes by those who travelled through the tunnels. But whether you intend to listen to them or make your  own way is entirely up to you.

Power is still running through the facility and your way is lit through this maze of dark corners and lost souls. 

Find your way out and reclaim the lost thoughts of those who came before. After all you are given boundless pieces of information everyday from stranger every day. Who's to say they're reliable in your resolve to trust them?

Team: Temporary Studio - MAW Studios

Will O'Shea; Level Design and Blueprint.

Mohamad Al Rida; Narrative Director and Blueprint.

Andrew Smith; Environment Texturing.
